panels.description: Particulate counts displayed in log scale

targets.query:
import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IPS7100CNR")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pc10_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: math.log10(x: r._value + 1.0) }))

  |> yield(name: "last")

import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IPS7100CNR")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pc5_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: math.log10(x: r._value + 1.0) }))

  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Particulate Size Distribution

targets.query:
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "GPGGAPL")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latitudeCoordinate" or r["_field"] == "longitudeCoordinate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last)
  |> last()

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MBCLR001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= ${Confidence})
  |> drop(columns: ["device_id", "device_name"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(desc: true)

panels.title: Live Particulate Count (in log scale)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BME688CNR")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MBCLR001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= ${Confidence})
  |> drop(columns: ["device_id", "device_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum)

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BME688CNR")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pressure")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BME688CNR")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
